stereo.plots.plot_spatial_distribution¶

stereo.plots.plot_spatial_distribution(adata, obs_key=['total_counts', 'n_genes_by_counts'], ncols=2, dot_size=None, color_list=None, invert_y=False)¶

spatial bin-cell distribution.

Parameters

  • adata (AnnData) – AnnData object.

  • obs_key (list) – specified obs key list, for example: [“total_counts”, “n_genes_by_counts”]

  • ncols – numbr of plot columns.

  • dot_size – marker size.

  • color_list – Color list.

  • invert_y – whether to invert y-axis.

Returns

None

Example:

plot_spatial_distribution(adata=adata)
